ABLE_TOKEN.description: Token that you can get from the webhook section in your Posts page inside Able settings. It is used to verify if the request is coming from Able.

GITHUB_TOKEN.description: An OAuth2 token that can be generated from Github settings to allow API based access to your repos. Don't forget to grant access to repos when generating the token.

GITHUB_REPO.description: Github repo where you want the updates to be pushed to

CONTENT_PATH.description: Path for where the post files are inside your repo. This is an absolute path value from your project root directory.
